title: How much does a $1,000 smart gadget actually cost to the manufacturer? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on the margin they are keeping and these days margins are insane sometimes. Besides, the price also depends on various other overheads that is not related to production and is unique to the manufacturer of the gadget. I have seen a $50 device recently that would have cost them less than $4 in manufacturing.
